title: Contacts Directory
description: Manage all contacts including client contacts, opposing counsel, and external parties
overview: The Contacts Directory centralizes all contact information beyond client contacts. Manage opposing counsel, government officers, witnesses, experts, and other external parties involved in your cases. Link contacts to cases and track all interactions.
